title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Building Control (Commencement
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Building Control (Commencement 

Notices) (Residential and Childcare Services Construction) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited building control (commencement notices) (residential childcare service construction) regulation 2021

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 2. In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. In these Regulations – 

“Principal Regulations” means Building Control Regulations 1997 (S. I. No. 
496 of 1997); 

“valid” in relation to a commencement notice given under article 8 of the 
Principal Regulations, means where the notice having been received by the 
building control authority concerned, the authority considers in accordance 
with article 10 of the Principal Regulations that it complies with the 
requirements of article 9 of those Regulations.
text_norm: 2 regulation - principal regulation mean building control regulation 1997 (s i no 496 1997) valid relation commencement notice given article 8 principal regulation mean notice received building control authority concerned authority considers accordance article 10 principal regulation complies requirement article 9 regulation

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 3. Where a person has given to a building control authority a
text_raw:
3. Where a person has given to a building control authority a 

commencement notice under article 8 of the Principal Regulations which 
relates to a residential construction project or construction activity relating to 
early learning and childcare or school aged childcare services, during the 
period from 3 December 2020 to 28 March 2021 and the notice is valid, the 
period of time referred to in that article within which to give the notice does 
not apply, but the works or the material change of use to which the 
commencement notice relates may, subject to any restrictions or prohibitions in 
regulations made under section 31A of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947), 
commence not later than 14 days after 12 April 2021. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [156] 3 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 1 April 2021 

PETER BURKE, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government 

and Heritage 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [156]

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of these Regulations is to facilitate the prompt commencement, as 
a result of the lifting of Covid restrictions, of residential construction projects 
or construction activity relating to early learning and childcare or school aged 
childcare services for which a valid commencement notice, submitted between 
3 December 2020 and 28 March 2021, relates. The Regulations allow a person 
commence these without submitting a new commencement notice, provided 
that they commence not later than 26 April 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [156] 5
